lead_paragraph: Williams, who dominated Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-0, 6-4, needs one victory to capture her seventh Australian Open championship and tie Steffi Graf’s Open-era record of 22 Grand Slam singles titles.
snippet: Williams, who dominated Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-0, 6-4, needs one victory to capture her seventh Australian Open championship and tie Steffi Graf’s Open-era record of 22 Grand Slam singles titles.

headline.main: Serena Williams Routs Radwanska and Nears a 22nd Major Title
headline.print_headline: Williams Routs Radwanska and Nears a 22nd Major Title

abstract: Serena Williams defeats Agnieszka Radwanska in Australian Open tennis tournament semifinals; Williams will tie Steffi Graf's record of 22 Grand Slam singles titles if she defeats Angelique Kerber in final.
